pages.text: Just you and the void.$(br2)Cobblestone can be generated in the vanilla way creating a cobblestone generator using lava and water.$(br2)Various additional recipes added for common resources such as sand, gravel and clay.$(br2)Saplings can also be converted into other saplings by crafting then in your crafting table.

Lava and water ceramic buckets can be crafted using redstone and lapis.$(br2)Seeds and other plant can also be crafted from wheat, apples and leaves.$(br2)Don't worry about falling to your death, forgiving void will respawn you in the air if you fall
